"Rooster In My Rari" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Rooster In My Rari" (feat. 2 Chainz, Waka Flocka Flame) [Intro: Waka Flocka] Pay for what? Girl you better pay for this Dick! She the type that fuck for 2 Xans and a outfit! (FLEX!) I'm with the Xan crew. So is hundreds on the Flo My house is off in the Mo Hey I be ballin Ho! [Hook: Waka Flocka] (Rooster in my Rari Ugh! [x2] Rooster in my Rari Ok!) [x2] Ok these hoes we done ran through em! Xans we done chewed em! Lames better salute em! FLEX! See these hoes We done ran through em! Xans we done chewed em! Lames better salute em! Ugh! [Verse 1: Waka Flocka] I don't like yo kind you a bougie ho! (Flocka!) All in my face like a groupie ho! (SQUAD!) I can't do it with one girl I need a group of hoes She FOOOOL when she on the that pole Break it down, pop it low, clap that, do it slow (Flocka!) Ran out of ones I'mma order some mo Shawty got good brains, on the honor role! You can't be no rookie with moves like that! Naw! Girl you a Pro! FLEX! Hundred bands in my pocket! Just to let you know! (Flocka!) I'm too turnt everything's a GO! (ROLLIN) What's it goin be?, What's it goin to cost? Everything's on me, My company Brick Squad Monopoly!!! SQUAAAAAAD!!! (Turn Up Leggo!: Waka Flocka) [Hook: Waka Flocka] (Rooster in my Rari Ugh! [x2] Rooster in my Rari Ok!) [x2] Ok these hoes we done ran through em! Xans we done chewed em! Lames better salute em! FLEX! See these hoes We done ran through em! Xans we done chewed em! Lames better salute em! Ugh! [Verse 2: Gucci Mane] Gucci Mane's a baller, hooper, shooter Yo girl is a booster, stupid rooster. (AH!: Gucci) Come through when I coop her Loose the roofa (catch Up!) We the bitch macker Choose a mover (DAMN) Brick Squad we the shit! Pooper Scooper! ([Fart sound:] Gucci) Yo man is a Bitch! Super Loser! (Ha!) They say I'm a user? Pussy bruiser (True> Gucci) I got to get a towel! She's a crazy Drooler (Haaa!) Shout out to my jeweler Frankie Muler (Buur!!) 10 chains on... Bitch I'm Ricky Ruler (BUUUR!!) Talkin Cash shit bitch Stanky Sewers (phhht) 6 bitches with me Yup 6 plural! GUCCI! (Turn Up Leggo! Waka Flocka) [Hook: Waka Flocka] (Rooster in my Rari Ugh! [x2] Rooster in my Rari Ok!) [x2] Ok these hoes we done ran through em! Xans we done chewed em! Lames better salute em! FLEX! See these hoes We done ran through em! Xans we done chewed em! (yeah!: 2 Chainz) Lames better salute em! Ugh! [Verse 3: 2 Chainz] 2 Chaaainz!! Whoa Kemosabe I get Rooster in my Rari (yeah!) Beez in Tha Trap I put my ding-a-ling on Barbie! (damn!) I go Dumb, I'm retarded Pockets on Charles Barkley I go Crazy Gnarls Barkley Lungs full of BOB MARLEY!!! (told em) I don't play no games But my joy stick from Atari (ughh!) All I eat is Beats, Pussy, and Calamari (T.R.U.!) This is a movie watch it all day tomorrow; If I meet yo ho tonight we fuckin all day tomorrow! (eughh: 2 Chainz) (Turn Up Leggo!: Waka Flocka) [Hook: Waka Flocka] (Rooster in my Rari Ugh! [x2] Rooster in my Rari Ok!) [x2] Ok these hoes we done ran through em! Xans we done chewed em! Lames better salute em! FLEX! See these hoes We done ran through em! Xans we done chewed em! Lames better salute em!
